title: Kapiti Island
description: Predator-free sanctuary with native wildlife, walking trails, and stunning views — the journey with the boat is an adventure in itself. Beware of the cheeky weka and kaka birds!

ratingNegative.text: i went there and was instantly jumped by a hoard of angry seals
ratingNegative.author: Matheo Sharp

ratingPositive.text: It is a nice looking island I love it when you are playing in the sand 😀😉 Go to beach now.have a great stay.!
ratingPositive.author: Josh Humphreys

title: Blue Penguins Pukekura
description: Watch the world's smallest penguins return to shore at dusk in; this is an almost guaranteed sighting. Pro tip: Do not run to the front of the viewing platform, as the penguins will walk by on the left, giving you a much better and longer view.

ratingNegative.text: They restrict the access to the beach. Not possible to see without a tour. Tourist trap!
ratingNegative.author: Mikhail Grevtsov

ratingPositive.text: They’re impossibly cute, like tiny plush toys come to life, and you can often hear them under the platform you’re standing on even if you can’t see them.
ratingPositive.author: Luthien E.

title: Chameleon Stargazing Tour
description: Take the opportunity to enjoy some guided stargazing with this tour at Lake Tekapo. Savor hot chocolate, cozy blankets, and roasted marshmallows under the night sky. Listen to enchanting stories and fascinating facts about the celestial wonders from your guide.

ratingNegative.text: We brought our 18-month-old child, and the stargazing guide rudely informed us that the child was too noisy and we'd be “kicked off” the bus. I feel this unfriendly attitude toward children really needs improvement. Roasting marshmallows was also boring.
ratingNegative.author: Zila. S

ratingPositive.text: GODDESS STARGAZING EXPERIENCE What a stunning experience with our two fabulous stargazing guides.
ratingPositive.author: Jocelyn Oades

title: Rotorua Forest Hot Tub Soak at Secret Spot
description: Take a break from a busy sightseeing schedule and relax in the tranquil natural environment of the Secret Spot Hot Tubs complex. Surrounded by the Whakarewarewa Forest are a collection of hand-crafted cedar hot tubs in which you can soak your aches and stress away.

ratingNegative.text: THIS IS NOT A THERMAL SPA. Dig deep enough in the FAQ and it states this but as far as I am concerned in Rotorua it is what is expected. Nice setting but not what I went there for.
ratingNegative.author: Kate Osborne

ratingPositive.text: We had a great early evening soak. It was nice to have the drinks delivered to our hot tub for us to enjoy.
ratingPositive.author: charlotte and kerry forsyth
